column2: The  Petitioner-Appellant  had  preferred  this  appeal  against  the
Respondent-Respondents, seeking to set aside the Order made by
the Provincial High Court Judge of North Western Province and to

enter  a  Judgement  endorsing  the  relief  prayed 
in  the  original
petition to the Provincial High Court.
The reliefs prayed for in the instant appeal are as follows;
